name: encrypt0r
description: A simple way to encrypt and decrypt your files

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/grunt build && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager . --all --overwrite --icon=assets/icons/icon.png --out=release-builds && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-darwin-x64.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-darwin-x64 && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-arm64.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-arm64 && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-armv7l.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-armv7l && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-x64.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-linux-x64 && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-ia32.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-ia32 && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-x64.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-x64 && zip -r release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-x64.zip release-builds/encrypt0r-win32-x64

author: Kunal Nagar <knlnagar@gmail.com>
